      • req

        public static java.lang.String req(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String para,
                                   JspIO jsp,
                                   java.lang.String attr)
        Make Input from request.
        Parameters:
        name - (String) Input "name" attribute.
        para - (String) Request parameter value. [option]
        jsp - (jjTool.JspIO) Source request Object.
        attr - (String) Input attribute texts. [option]
        Returns:
        HTML Form <INPUT> text.
